title: Halo 2 - Original Soundtrack - Volume Two [Ogg Vorbis]
description:
Album: http://www.amazon.com/dp/B000EZ8ZXK

This album is the sequel to Martin O&#039;Donnell&#039;s and Michael Salvatori&#039;s _Halo_2_Original_Soundtrack_Volume_One_.  Due to the time when the first was released, they were unable to use all the in-game music in that album.  This release contains 12 tracks, each one being a multi-part movement from various levels and areas in Halo 2.

Audio is ripped using cdparanoia (non-Windows equivalent of EAC) and encoded using aoTuV Ogg Vorbis at q3.  If you want high fidelity, I&#039;d recommend you buy the album or something (it&#039;s worth it if you like classical music or enjoy the music from Halo 2).
